title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: 5E Model-Based Flipped Learning and Communication Tools Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design and execute flipped learning activities according to each phase of the 5E Model (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate).
Learners improve collaborative learning effectiveness with peers by over 30% through context-appropriate use of MIM tools and asynchronous forums.
Learners lead language projects in a flipped learning environment, securing at least 25% more problem-solving time compared to traditional methods.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
